CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "Printed - English"), IF (((MOD(Date_Sent_to_Vendor__c - DATE(1985,6,24),7) =4) || (MOD(Date_Sent_to_Vendor__c - DATE(1985,6,24),7)) =3),Date_Sent_to_Vendor__c+11,Date_Sent_to_Vendor__c+9),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "Electronic - English") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "8 ½ x 11 Electronic - English"), IF ((MOD(Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c- DATE(1985,6,24),7) =4),Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c+3,Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c+1),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "8 ½ x 11 Printed - English") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "Inserts Only Printed - English"), IF (((MOD(Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c - DATE(1985,6,24),7) =4) || (MOD(Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c - DATE(1985,6,24),7)) =3),Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c+11,Client_Approved_to_Print_Date__c+9),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "Printed - Spanish") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "8 ½ x 11 Printed - Spanish") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "Electronic - Spanish") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "8 ½ x 11 Electronic -Spanish")|| ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c , "Inserts Only Printed - Spanish") , IF ((MOD(Returned_from_Translator_Date__c- DATE(1985,6,24),7) =4),Returned_from_Translator_Date__c+3,Returned_from_Translator_Date__c+1),
null ))))
CustomField.label: OK to Print Date
